resources.string:
==Discovery== **Discovered by:** Giuseppe Piazzi
 **Discovery date:** 1 January 1801
==Orbital characteristics== **Distance from sun:** 413.8 million km (2.77 AU)
 **Eccentricity:** 0.0793
 **Orbital period:** 4.60 years
 **Average orbital speed:** 17.882 km/s
 **Inclination to ecliptic:** 10.585°
==Physical characteristics== **Equatorial radius:** 487.3 km
 **Mass:** 9.43×10^^20^^ kg
 **Mean density:** 2.077 g/cm³
 **Equatorial surface gravity:** 0.27 m/s² (0.028 g)
 **Escape velocity:** 0.51 km/s
 **Sidereal rotation period:** 9h 4m 28s
 **Axial tilt:** ~3°
 **Albedo:** 0.090 (V-band geometric)
 **Surface temp.:** ~167K(mean) 239K(max)
 **Spectral type:** C (carbonaceous)


Find out more on [[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ceres_(dwarf_planet)|wikipedia]].
